com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.scanner
Class BoundedRowScanner

java.lang.Object
  com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.scanner.BoundedRowScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
RowScanner
public class BoundedRowScanner
extends Object
implements RowScanner

A Scanner that constraints concurrent requests with a Semaphore. To obtain an instance of a RowScanner, call BoundedHBaseClient.newScanner(byte[]).

Constructor Summary
BoundedRowScanner(RowScanner scanner, Semaphore semaphore)
          Creates a new BoundedRowScanner for the given underlying RowScanner, constrained by the given Semaphore.

Constructor Detail

BoundedRowScanner

public BoundedRowScanner(RowScanner scanner,
                         Semaphore semaphore)
Creates a new BoundedRowScanner for the given underlying RowScanner, constrained by the given Semaphore.

Parameters:
scanner - the underlying RowScanner implementation
semaphore - a Semaphore to contrains the maximum number of concurrent requests
